full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement:**
---------------------------------

**Project Title:** Installation of Perimeter Security Upgrades and Minor Interior Renovations at the Canadian Embassy, Lima, Peru
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010741
**Solicitation Number:** 23-225773

**Project Overview**
------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, representing Her Majesty the Queen in right of Canada, invites qualified suppliers to submit a request for qualification (RFQ) for the installation of perimeter security upgrades and minor interior renovations at the Canadian Embassy in Lima, Peru.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The project includes the installation of:

* Anti-ram furniture, including stationary and retractable bollards
* Anti-pedestrian fencing, including raising and refinishing walls, adding toppers, and raising garage doors
* Main guard house extension on Bolognesi Street
* Electrical and mechanical services, including new electrical service to the guard house, ventilation, and plumbing
* Fire alarm system
* Perimeter lighting

This work will be delivered using the bid-build methodology, with the pre-qualified supplier following drawings and scope of work outlined in the request for proposal (RFP) stage 2.

**Prequalification Requirements**
-----------------------------

To be considered, suppliers must:

* Possess the necessary experience and expertise for this type of project
* Be capable of providing the full range of services required in English or French
* Be able to travel to and perform commissioning guidance in Lima, Peru

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

Prequalification will be based on defined mandatory requirements specified in the RFQ document (Item 2. Mandatory Requirements for Prequalification).

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: November 4, 2022
